channel.title: CGRU - AFANASY
channel.description: CGRU: CG Tools&Rules. Afanasy Free Open Source Render Farm Manager.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.2.3 Released.
item.description: Afanasy server new networking architecture allows bigger amount of clients. Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.2.2 Released.
item.description: Maya Redshift support. Afanasy parsers update. Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.2.1 Released.
item.description: Isotropix Clarisse iFX support. Keeper shows machine memory usage in a system tray icon. AfServer solves jobs by running tasks total capacity (by default), not just by running tasks count. Each new job acquires an unique serial number. You can get jobs from server by serial. Rules artists got automatic bookmarks on assigned shots.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.2.0 Released.
item.description: Afanasy server on restart reconnects running tasks. Houdini distributed simulations support. Rules export shots to HTML table that can be saved, printed in PDF, opened in Exel. Bugfixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.1.0 Released.
item.description: Afanasy clients does not listen port (and afrender and afwatch). Server can serve much greater number of clients. Client can work behind a firewall/router. No local network needed. Afrender can skip existing files and check rendered files. Rules file buffer to move files and folders. Bugfixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.0.8 Released.
item.description: AfWatch desktop notifications. Rules tasks prices, auxiliary folders, user ips. Bugfixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.0.7 Released.
item.description: Keeper show/change local render user. Natron and Fusion integration.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.0.6 Released.
item.description: Bugfixes from 2.0.5 (the main reason of this release). Afanasy Auto NIMBY and Auto Free now can depend on MEM, SWAP, HDD and Network usage (was only CPU). RULES dailies with sound.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.0.5 Released.
item.description: Afanasy PPA: Preview Pending Approval jobs. AfStarter supports Natron. AfRender can generate thumbnail from running task. RULES uploads masks, tasks prices. Bugfixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.0.4 Released.
item.description: Afanasy job block frame sequential new parameter. RULES permissions to edit tasks, body, playlist, assign artists. Bugfixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.0.3 Released.
item.description: Afanasy service and parser changes, WebGUI custom resources support. RULES: News filter, users(artists) roles, Nuke scene template. Bugfixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.0.2 Released.
item.description: Afanasy GUI job item ETA. Movie Maker (Dailies) Apple ProRes422 and 444 10-bit. RULES: Tasks and reports statistics, Create/extract archives and put files on FTP with Afanasy. Minor bugfixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.0.1 Released.
item.description: RULES: Convert multiply selected movies or sequences to other movies or sequences. You can change codec, fps, resolution and convert DPX-es to JPEG-s with a specified colorspace and quality, for example. Such calculations will be processed on a farm via Afanasy. Afanasy server several bugs fixed. This is the major reason of this release.

item.title: CGRU Version 2.0.0 Released.
item.description: Afanasy server store state in JSON files, no SQL database needed for it. Tasks thumbnails, Python service post function. Web GUI and RULES is not beta now.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.7.0 Released.
item.description: RULES (beta) - web based CG progects tracker. Forum (beta) based on RULES web engine. Web GUI (beta, no authentication). Automatic Nimby. Afanasy server events and notifications (email).

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.12 Released.
item.description: Minor features. Minor bugfixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.11 Released.
item.description: Bug fixes. Maya users should look at meTools for Afanasy.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.10 Released.
item.description: Bug fixes. World fixed: no the end.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.9 Released.
item.description: Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.8 Released.
item.description: Automatic Wake-On-Lan.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.7 Released.
item.description: New documentation. All config moved to from XML to json, including farm setup and pathsmap. You can setup various OS-es in the same file.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.6 Released.
item.description: PySide and license. New linux package 'afanasy-qtgui' to remove Qt dependence from 'afanasy-server' and 'afanasy-render' packages. Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.5 Released.
item.description: Afanasy python parser can consider that task is already done and finish(stop) it with a success. Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.4 Released.
item.description: New domain cgru.info started. Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.3 Released.
item.description: Nuke render and submission scripts options added to skip paths map and render to temporary image stages. Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.2 Released.
item.description: JSON age started. No binary python module needed. Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.1 Released.
item.description: Tasks can be solved in a not-sequential manner. For example 1-10: 0 9 5 2 7 1 3 6 8 4. You can hide jobs or renders in AfWatch by some parameter. AfWatch can preview tasks of a not-numeric blocks (This bug is a main reason of this release).

item.title: CGRU Version 1.6.0 Released.
item.description: Afanasy server is available for MS Windows platform. AfWatch GUI styles and various customizations. Default look is civil (not military). Administrator can change job owner. No Qt library in Afanasy render client. So Qt is used for GUI only now. GitHub CGRU project started.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.5.5 Released.
item.description: Server has customizable acceptable IP addresses mask. Movie Maker custom container and ability to save settings. User can set jobs solving to parallel. Only PostgreSQL database is supported as native library is used instead of QtSql.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.5.4 Released.
item.description: AltLinux RPM packages. Blender Cycles render engine support. Nimby schedule and Afanasy Starter improvements. MSVC 10 and Qt 4.8.0. Some important bugs fixed.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.5.3 Released.
item.description: Some important bugs fixed.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.5.2 Released.
item.description: Movie Maker can explode movie to sequence and add sound from a file with audio. Keeper displays local Afanasy render client status in a system tray icon. Some important bugs fixed.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.5.1 Released.
item.description: Keeper - a system tray application with menu, designed launch CGRU and AFANASY tools, setup and start other software applications to run with CGRU configured. Standalone dialog to submit jobs. Abobe After Effects support.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.5.0 Released.
item.description: Sub-task dependences to start render during simulation. Houdini submission major improvements. Technical changes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.4.5 Released.
item.description: MAX, Maya, XSI 2012. Blender 2.5. Python 3. Render client bug fix.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.4.4 Released.
item.description: New features. Bug fixes.

item.title: CGRU Version 1.4.3 Released.
item.description: Server memory leak fixed.
